Detailed Description

This class, CubeCommunication is used to interact with the Qube.

Member Function Documentation

int CubeCommunication::ConnectionTest (  )  [private]

Checks if a Cube is connected to the openened COM-Port.

If a Qube5 is receives a 'T', it responds with a 'T' character

void CubeCommunication::startProgramming ( QByteArray  data,
int  count 
) [slot]

Launches a new SerialThread for Programming the Qube.

A new SerialThread is created and startet at Low Priority.

Parameters:
[in] data - QByteArray, containing the complete Data set (see MainWindow::prepareProgramming())
[in] count - the number of Figures that are programmed
See also:
MainWindow::prepareProgramming()
void CubeCommunication::updateLiveModeStates ( QBitArray *  states  )  [slot]

Sends the updated states to the Qube, if in LiveMode.

If the Qube has been connected, any changes made in the cubeWidget will be sent to the Qube and displayed in Real-Time
